data.meaning_mnemonic: There is a <radical>woman</radical> and a <radical>child</radical> in front of you. You <kanji>like</kanji> them very much.
data.meaning_hint: Imagine a woman and a child you like very much. Just appreciate them, and think about how much you like those two. The reading mnemonic definitely won't ruin your image of them or anything.
data.reading_mnemonic: "I <kanji>like</kanji> you two," you say to the woman and child. They both turn their heads 180 degrees back towards you. They both have faces that look just like <reading>こう</reading>いち's. "We like you too," they say in unison.
data.reading_hint: And you DO like them. You have always been a fan of こういち's kanji learning methods, and you feel so lucky to have married a woman who looks just like こういち and then (this is the real miracle!) gave birth to a child that looks like こういち too. Hashtag blessed.
